items.sentence: Tom spends a lot of time in his room studying.
The question is whether Tom will do it or not.
Tom lent me enough money to buy what I needed.
Tom was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.
Can you explain why Tom wasn't at the meeting?
I haven't been able to get a smile out of Tom.
Tom isn't the kind of guy who gives up easily.
Tom put the tranquilizer gun back in its case.
Tom made up his mind to ask Mary to marry him.
Do you think it could be the same Tom Jackson?
